name: SPEC India
description:
SPEC INDIA is an ISO 9001:2008 & ISO/IEC 27001:2013 company with 30 years of established experience. We specialize in Custom Software Development, Web & Mobile Application Development, BI & Analytics Solutions, Cloud Based Applications, Big Data, Desktop Applications, Enterprise Mobile Solutions, Application Migration, 365x24x7 Support and Maintenance, Quality Assurance & Testing, UI/UX services, IoT & Beacons Solutions.
 
SPEC INDIA has team of 250+ Consultants, who are committed to deliver Quality Solution to Global Customers. Our Extended Development Centers, Outsourcing and Offshore Alliances and Innovative business models help us service our Fortune 100, SME’s and Startups.
We have offered Custom Enterprise Solutions to different Industry Verticals like Retail & FMCG, Healthcare, Education, Automotive, Shipping & Logistic, Sales & Distribution, Energy & Utilities, Real Estate and Digital Marketing. Our vibrant young team understands the global culture and ensures utmost customer satisfaction.
READ MORE...

locations.address: SPEC House , Parth Complex , Swastik Cross Roads
